column260: I had withdrawals from the Adderall which doesn't usually happen to me but sheer boredom during lock-down made it inevitable. I have depression and anxiety and complete lack of motivation which is usually fixed up with kratom but that did not work after this last round of Adderall.This is why I decided to try modafinil and I am pleasantly surprised. It makes me feel the same way Gabapentin makes me feel which is super happy, loving, and energetic. I also have bad withdrawals from kratom, however I haven't ran out of that for around six months.
